boardgame.name: Relic
Relic: Tajemnica Sektora Antian
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Relic is a board game in which two to four players each assume the role of a powerful hero from the Warhammer 40,000 universe and bravely venture forth to shield the Antian Sector from certain doom. By completing missions and defeating enemies, characters compete to gain rewards and experience, furthering their chance of being the first to defeat whatever evil lies beyond the Warp rift._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Building on the foundations of the Talisman system, Relic is an adventure game in which seemingly straightforward choices mask scores of possibilities. For those who haven't played the classic fantasy adventure game Talisman, this means that on each turn, a player rolls a single six-sided die before moving his playing piece that number of spaces clockwise or counter-clockwise around the region (outer, middle, or inner) of the board it currently occupies. That player then draws a card or cards to see what he's encountered, pitting his heroic persona against foul enemies, dangerous locations, and fantastic strangers. And all the while, these intrepid heroes rise in power, as they work their way toward the ultimate goal at the center of the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

PRICE INCLUDES SHIPPING AND HANDLING This item is shrink-wrapped and in factory fresh condition and the price includes shipping to mainland UK locations through Collect+ with online parcel tracking. All items will be posted next business day and should be with you within 3 days. Thanks for looking and have a great game! (If you are looking to ship to mainland Europe, this will increase the price)

We only sell brand new, unopened games - so this game will be delivered to you directly from our warehouse as if you had ordered directly from our online store. Postal Charges are determined by the weight of the item(s) so if you want to buy more than one game we will work out the postal charges based on the combined weight (which could add to your savings). Post within the UK for this game: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3-7 Day Delivery = £4.75 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2-3 Day Delivery = £7.40 We also offer a Collect+ Service (for £3.99 for order up to 10kg - typically 3 or 4 games!!) to most areas - in which we send your parcel to one of your local shops that act as a collection centre for this service. You simply have to pick up your parcel within 10 days of receiving a message telling you it awaits collection (typically within 3-5 days of dispatch). We can tell you more if you are interested. Strategy Board _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Card Games is just one of the sections of our online shop that are designed to challenge you to ThinkSomeMore - so you can rest assured you are going to receive a quality product, carefully packaged and dispatched at a great price - from professional service. Postal Charges to other countries within the EU will be quoted upon request. Typically, there is an additional charge of £3.00 or £4.00

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGRE01) A Warp rift has erupted near the Antian Sector, and under its baleful influence Chaos infestations and other abhorrent phenomena have surfaced. To face this threat, agents of the Imperium have come forth: Space Marine, Inquisitor, Commissar, Rogue Trader, and more. To succeed, such heroes will need skill and weaponry, courage and faith, and even the assistance of ancient and powerful relics. Relic is a board game in which two to four players each assume the role of a powerful hero from the Warhammer 40,000 universe and bravely venture forth to shield the Antian Sector from certain doom. By completing missions and defeating enemies, characters compete to gain rewards and experience, furthering their chance of being the first to defeat whatever evil lies beyond the Warp rift.
